Package goGame

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • goGame.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing the model for the GO game.
    Author:
    Huub Lievestro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game​(int boardDim, Player blackPlayer, Player whitePlayer)
      Creates a new Game instance, including the board, and associates Players to it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Board getBoard()
      Get the board of this game.
      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current player.
      double getKomi()
      Get the Komi as currently set for this game.
      int getNumberPlayers()
      Get the number of players of this game.
      java.lang.String getScores()
      Get the current scores of both players.
      void moveToNextPlayer()
      Moves game to the next player.
      void print()
      Prints the game situation, to the standard system output (of the VM running the game).
      void reset()
      Resets the game.
      void setKomi​(double komi)
      Set the Komi for this game.
      void update()
      Updates the game, by applying the following GO rule(s) to the board: - A stone or solidly connected group of stones of one color is captured and removed from the board when all the intersections directly adjacent to it are occupied by the enemy.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(int boardDim,
            Player blackPlayer,
            Player whitePlayer)
        Creates a new Game instance, including the board, and associates Players to it.
        Parameters:
        boardDim - is dimension of the board
        blackPlayer - the first player, and will be playing with BLACK
        whitePlayer - the second player, and will be playing with WHITE
        Requires
        blackPlayer and whitePlayer to be non-null

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the game.
        The board is emptied and player[0] becomes the current player.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Returns the current player.
        Returns:
        Player current player

      • moveToNextPlayer

        public void moveToNextPlayer()
        Moves game to the next player.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the game situation, to the standard system output (of the VM running the game).

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the game, by applying the following GO rule(s) to the board: - A stone or solidly connected group of stones of one color is captured and removed from the board when all the intersections directly adjacent to it are occupied by the enemy. (Capture of the enemy takes precedence over self-capture.)

      • getScores

        public java.lang.String getScores()
        Get the current scores of both players.
        Returns:
        scores String, with scoreBlack + DELIMITER + scoreWhite.

      • getKomi

        public double getKomi()
        Get the Komi as currently set for this game.
        Returns:
        Komi for this game

      • setKomi

        public void setKomi​(double komi)
        Set the Komi for this game.
        Ensures
        this game has Komi set to requested komi

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Get the board of this game.
        Returns:
        board, the current state of the board associated with this game.

      • getNumberPlayers

        public int getNumberPlayers()
        Get the number of players of this game.
        Returns:
        NUMBER_PLAYERS, the current number of players associated with this game.
